dialogueTree.enemyPhrase: Ah, a mere mortal dares to venture into my domain. What do you seek, insignificant one?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I seek to challenge your rule over this realm!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Bold words from a fragile being. You will regret this defiance.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will not back down, for the light will prevail over your darkness!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Foolish mortal, your light is a mere flicker in the face of my eternal night.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will fight until my last breath, for hope never dies!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: So be it. Prepare to face the icy wrath of Cryonos, the Frost Serpent!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I see no point in continuing this futile battle. I shall retreat.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Ha! Flee, coward, for your weakness only strengthens my resolve.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Perhaps there is a way for us to coexist peacefully in this realm.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Peace with a being of light? Such naivety. Your kind is not welcome here.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I understand, then I shall take my leave and bother you no more.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: A wise decision. Begone from my sight, insignificant one.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I refuse to accept your darkness. I will find a way to bring light back to this realm.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: You are as stubborn as you are foolish. Prepare to face the consequences of your arrogance.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I sense fear and loneliness in your words. Is there a reason behind your malevolence?
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Fear? Loneliness? You know nothing, mortal. My power is absolute, and I have no need for compassion.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Your power may be great, but true strength lies in compassion and understanding.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Enough of your prattle. Face the chill of death's embrace, fool!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I pity you, trapped in this eternal darkness. There is always a chance for redemption.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Pity me? Your words are as empty as your existence. I have no use for redemption.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I come in peace, seeking knowledge and understanding of your realm.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Peace? Knowledge? You amuse me, mortal. What could you possibly offer in exchange for such things?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I offer my respect and willingness to learn from your wisdom.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Respect and willingness? Those are rare traits in your kind. Very well, mortal. Continue.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I seek to understand the reason behind your malevolence and find a way to bring harmony to this realm.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Harmony? In this realm of shadows and despair? Your optimism is amusing, but futile.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I believe that even in darkness, there can be a glimpse of light. I wish to find that balance.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Balance? Light in darkness? Your idealism is a weakness, mortal. Prepare for disappointment.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I offer a truce between us, to coexist peacefully and share the knowledge of our respective worlds.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: A truce? Between light and darkness? Such a concept is beyond your comprehension, mortal.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I believe that understanding and respect can bridge any divide, even between opposites like us.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Understanding? Respect? Your words are empty, mortal. Prepare yourself for what comes next.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: If peace is not an option, then I shall leave in peace, hoping our paths do not cross in conflict.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Leave in peace? Hah, your naivety knows no bounds. You are not worth my attention.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I seek nothing but passage through this realm. I mean no harm to you or your denizens.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Passage? Harmlessness? You intrigue me, mortal. But beware, my patience is as fleeting as your existence.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I assure you, my presence here is purely out of necessity. I will disturb nothing in my journey.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Assurances mean nothing in this realm, mortal. Your mere presence is disturbance enough.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: If my presence here offends you, then I shall leave immediately without causing any further trouble.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Your consideration is noted, but in the end, it matters not. The outcome remains the same.
